subtitles.subtitle1: This is your reference website to keep track of the Spanish Football League. Check out the Fantasy Points and the overall performance of your favourite team's and fantasy team's players. You can also use our tool FantasyWiz, to help you form your best lineup for the next match date.
subtitles.subtitle2: In the graphic below you can visualize the scores and games for the next match date. If you would like to see further details about a game, click on it.
subtitles.subtitle3: To visualize the scores of every match date, you are able to do it by using the section "Matches".

footballWiz.title: FotballWiz Fantasy Tool
footballWiz.subtitle: Find out the best possible lineup for your Fantasy League team for the next match date. Add all your players to the list and select the formation you would like to use. If you don't want to select a formation, just select "Best" in the formation selector and the tool will decide the best option.
footballWiz.emptyMessage: You haven't selected any player for this position yet.
